summary.para: The DVD_MultichannelAudioAttributes structure describes the multichannel attributes of one audio stream within a specified title.

remarks.para: The structure contains an array of up to eight DVD_MultichannelAudioAttributes structures. When DVD_TitleAttributes is filled by a call to the method, the array will be populated with one DVD_MultichannelAudioAttributes structure for each available audio stream in the title.

summary.para: Array of eight structures, which contain the mixing information for each channel in the audio stream.
Array of eight structures, which contain the mixing coefficients for each channel in the audio stream.
